scripts.format: npm run format --prefix web-ui && npm run format --prefix apps/session-gateway
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix web-ui -- --max-warnings=0 && npm run lint --prefix apps/session-gateway -- --max-warnings=0
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix web-ui && npm run typecheck --prefix apps/session-gateway
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix web-ui && npm run test:coverage --prefix apps/session-gateway
